"monchi and the Mysterious Nuts":
"Hello! My name is monchi.
I have an obsession with fashion.
I was thinking of changing the buttons on
my coat to something cuter...
There's these mysterious button-shaped
nuts held by Fang Banshees.
If you have a chance, do you think you
could get me some of those?

※Drops from Lv.1+ Fang Banshee."

"Ability Success Rate +45%
※1 per account, given upon completion."
